alert.note: Alert for Kerr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:37PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Kerr and southwestern Gillespie Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 437 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Harper, or 10 miles northwest of Kerrville, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ingram, Hunt, Mountain Home, Kerr Wildlife Management Area, Waltonia and Harper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
